General.Name: Guangxi Bossco Environmental Protection Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi Bossco Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd. provides environmental management, professional technical, and operations services in China and internationally. The company offers industrial wastewater treatment solutions, which includes up-flow multistage anaerobic reactor and heterogeneous oxidation towers, and counter flow continuous sand filters. It also provides urban and rural environmental services, including urban black odor water treatment services; water supply and drainage integration projects; and sewage treatment system equipment. In addition, the company offers water environment treatment technology that provides quantitative treatment and resource utilization of high-concentration organic wastewater such as landfill leachate, chemical, and pharmaceutical waste, as well as provides key equipment and technology for cleaning pulp bleaching, large-scale chlorine dioxide preparation system, and related chemical technology. Further, it provides sodium hypochlorite generator disinfection equipment and chlorine dioxide solid disinfectant series for water supply/tap water disinfection, sewage treatment, sanitation disinfection, customs epidemic prevention, breeding and disinfection, food processing, fruit and vegetable preservation, air disinfection, environmental disinfection, etc., and consulting services for the environmental protection project consulting, environmental impact assessment, testing, and design. The company also exports its technologies and products. Guangxi Bossco Environmental Protection Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Nanning, China.
